pageContext.title: Home Renovations
pageContext.excerpt: We work with each and every homeowner to make sure their home is safe and efficient. At Full Spectrum we understand how important it is that your household electricity is running properly, that is why we offer home electrical services at a competitive price.
pageContext.content:
Full Spectrum can help with Residential Electrical Repairs, replacement, and installation. If you are looking for a Residential Electrician in Nelson, trust Full Spectrum. 

We work with each and every homeowner to make sure their home is safe and efficient. At Full Spectrum we understand how important it is that your household electricity is running properly, that is why we offer home electrical services at a competitive price.
